Sentencas: In this study, nanocomposites of LaCePr-oxide (LCP) and Ni0.8Co0.15Al0 05LIO2-delta (NCAL) with different contents of polyvinylidene fluoride (PVDF) were prepared and applied to solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Polymer-assistant ceramic nanocomposite materials for advanced fuel cell technologies

Sentencas: The composite materials were characterized by X-ray diffraction analysis (XRD), scanning electron microscope (SEM), thermogravimetric analysis (TGA), differential scanning calorimetry (DSC) and electrochemical impedance spectrum (EIS).
Titulo: Polymer-assistant ceramic nanocomposite materials for advanced fuel cell technologies

Sentencas: The effect of PVDF concentration on the conductivity and performance of the fuel cells was investigated.
Titulo: Polymer-assistant ceramic nanocomposite materials for advanced fuel cell technologies

Sentencas: It was found that PVDF plays a template role of pore forming in the nanocomposites, and the changed microstructure by as-formed pores greatly influences the electrochemical property of the nanocomposites.
Titulo: Polymer-assistant ceramic nanocomposite materials for advanced fuel cell technologies

Sentencas: The cell with 3 wt% PVDF heat-treated at 210 C-omicron achieved the highest power density of 982 mW cm(-2) at 520 C-omicron, which enhanced performance by more than 57% than when no heat-treatment was implemented.
Titulo: Polymer-assistant ceramic nanocomposite materials for advanced fuel cell technologies

Sentencas: It is 66% higher than the cell with no PVDF and no heat-treatment.
Titulo: Polymer-assistant ceramic nanocomposite materials for advanced fuel cell technologies

Sentencas: Pores formed by PVDF after heat-treatment enlarged the triple phase boundary (TPB), which results in improved fuel cell performance.
Titulo: Polymer-assistant ceramic nanocomposite materials for advanced fuel cell technologies
